turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some coffee for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help with that. where would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from Peet's on North Clark Street in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order from peet's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, could you repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and was that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add almond milk to it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 medium hot vanilla latte with almond milk from peet's on north clark street in chicago will be $3.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 10 minutes. the receipt has been sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too.
